item.title: Bradpkz - Pvp server
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“Sp3ke, post:11, topic:299830”][quote author=CoonHunter link=topic=396133.msg2942607#msg2942607 date=1251999299]

yes i am running it now.

Ok logging on

Dude no ofense but everybody leeches, we all have LEECHED runescape, this word is getting old and is now just used pointlessly

I’m not normally one to complain when it comes to leeching. But I just logged on the server, and you should of seen it. It was identical, nothing had changed with the exception of the home being in lumbridge. I mean, it’s just pathetic how a home-change can be classed as a new release.

No it is not pathetic, yes you may have done stuff to it, but you downloaded a begining base as well, meaning you “leeched” your base from someone. Almost ALL bases are leeched from WL on this site, unless you manage to find a true blank.
[/quote]
Ok because there not truley “leeched” this gives someone the right to change the home, and release the source?

If so, then I’ll be releasing a new source a day.[/quote]
Dont be a fucking idiot, i said we leeched from the 1 main base, WinterLove. That is one of the first rsps’s and 90% of servers on mopar are a WL leech, unless you worked from a blank you leeched from winterlove, or a high chance of it.

Read full topic

item.title: Bradpkz - Pvp server
item.dc:creator: @Sp3ke Sp3ke
item.description:
@Sp3ke wrote:

[quote=“gelert, post:12, topic:299830”]sp3ke get fucking owned!

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

You leeched to that is a pvp server all u did was move the stuff and re name it so gtfo.[/quote]

Here’s a list of stuff that I ADDED. Quoted straight of my topic, also added alot of small things. I don’t think you can say the same.

[QUOTE]

Feature’s that I HAVE ADDED (CREDITS TO ME ) : -

  • New home (Obviously)

  • Fully working highscores. None of that cammy PVP rubbish.

  • Fully working pkpoint reward shop.

  • Death Cape + Donator’s cape models.

  • Limited login to 12 characters, preventing those stupid cheat clients with 100+ characters.

  • Fully functional thieving

  • Fixed 80% of dupes

  • A stronger anti-syi, the existing one failed.

  • Donators Zone

  • Edited alot of the items bonuses, because most of them were way over-powered.

  • You’re pk points are now displayed instead of you’re quest points

  • Portal to KBD, with decent drops. (Economy based PVP-SERVER)

  • Fixed the smite glitch on where you lose all you’re items where smited[/QOUTE]

Read full topic
